title: Mycotic Hepatic Artery Aneurysm in Staphylococcus aureus Infective Endocarditis.
abstract: We present the case of a woman in her 70s with a history of rheumatoid arthritis on long-term immunosuppression, previous breast cancer, and interstitial lung disease, who was admitted with fever, rigors, malaise, and gastrointestinal symptoms. Blood cultures grew
